solution_line_template: While camping there was {rain_day1} + {rain_day2} + {rain_day3} = <<{rain_day1}+{rain_day2}+{rain_day3}={rain_camping}>>{rain_camping} mm of rain in 3 days.
Greg experienced {rain_house} – {rain_camping} = <<{rain_house}-{rain_camping}={rain_difference}>>{rain_difference} mm less rain at the campsite.
